column4: anyone available to help with a desktop version installation to a virtual machine?

i'm having trouble installing ubuntu on my virtual machine. i got it to load and got the boot menu ( my choices are [start or install ubuntu], [start ubuntu in safe graphics mode] [install with driver update cd] [OEM install (for manufacturers)], [check for defects], [memory test], [boot from first hard disk]) and i can move the highlight from one choice to the other but when i press enter it does'nt do anything
hit tab and select the no vga option
what options do you see pm me
